name: number-theory-js
description: The Sieve of Eratosthenes (an ancient Greek prime number generator) as a JavaScript library

scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && rm -f dist/* && rm -f package-lock.json
scripts.cleanw: rmdir /Q /S node_modules & del /Q dist\* & del package-lock.json
scripts.rebuild: npm run clean & npm run build
scripts.rebuildw: npm run cleanw & npm run buildw

author: Tom Weatherhead <null@2hrd4u.org> (https://httpbin.org/status/418)
